sunpalm_resident_i.title: Sun Palm Resident I
sunpalm_resident_i.description:
Beautiful and exclusive residential project of only 6 Villas, 7 minutes from the Airport and 3 minutes from Coco Bongo and the main Malls, Shops, Supermarkets and Banks.

Gated complex with double access from Bulevar del Coral and Ave. Barcel√≥ with 24-hour security, security checkpoint and vehicular entrance with remote control barrier.

2 and 3 bedroom villas with Jacuzzi
